name: Pie Planet: Octopus flavour
description:
A tiny simulation game, about a little human, and his octopus pet trying to set up the planet he landed up on !

A game by FafaStudio

Hugo Rodriguez

Axel Garcia

Hugo Bombail

Jean Claisse

A - D : Go to left/right
Right click : Send Poulpi grab a barrel
Wheel up/down : Zoom/Dezoom

1.2 update changelog (only bug fixing) :

  • Win condition now works
  • interfaces bug fixes
  • Removing satellites on ore fields now works
  • Building bug after a few construction fixed
  • Feedback Sounds fixes
  • Sound design a bit lower
  • Defense buildings now works entirely
  • Magnet now works
  • Upgrades now works
  • Satellites durability and repairing now works
  • Balancing of resources making game funnier
